channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 红海袭击目前不太可能影响法国对亚洲的谷物出口 - FranceAgriMer
item.description: Attacks on ships in the Red Sea are unlikely for now to affect exports of French cereals to Asia, notably China which is a key market for France, since they are targeted at ships going towards Israel, farm office FranceAgriMer on Wednesday.翻译:FranceAgriMer农业部周三表示，红海船只袭击事件目前不太可能影响法国谷物对亚洲的出口，特别是对法国重要市场中国的出口，因为这些袭击的目标是前往以色列的船只。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国商务部官员称，违反出口管制行为将受到更高处罚
item.description: The Biden administration will crack down on companies that violate U.S. export rules, with stiffer penalties to deter future violations, a Department of Commerce (DOC) official said late on Tuesday.翻译:美国商务部 (DOC) 一位官员周二晚间表示，拜登政府将严厉打击违反美国出口规定的公司，并采取更严厉的处罚措施，以阻止未来再次出现违规行为。
item.author: Karen Freifeld

item.title: 台湾报告选举后中国首次重大军事活动
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it had detected on Wednesday evening 18 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships, the first large-scale post-election military activity.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周三晚上发现有 18 架中国空军飞机在台湾周围活动，并与中国军舰进行“联合战备巡逻”，这是选举后的首次大规模军事活动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: OneD 与 Koch Modular 合作扩大硅石墨电动汽车阳极材料规模
item.description: OneD Battery Sciences and Koch Modular said on Wednesday they have teamed up to build a factory in North America to produce enough silicon-graphite anode material to supply batteries for around 1 million EVs annually.翻译:OneD Battery Sciences 和 Koch Modular 周三表示，他们已联手在北美建立一家工厂，生产足够的硅石墨负极材料，每年为约 100 万辆电动汽车供应电池。
item.author: Nick Carey

item.title: 中国总理访问爱尔兰着眼深化经济联系
item.description: China would like to deepen economic and trade cooperation with Ireland, particularly in areas of "huge potential" such as green technologies and the digital economy, Premier Li Qiang said on Wednesday during a trip to Dublin.翻译:李强总理周三在都柏林访问期间表示，中国愿深化与爱尔兰的经贸合作，特别是在绿色技术和数字经济等“潜力巨大”的领域。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度拒绝铁矿石开采商NMDC关于向中国出口铁矿石的提议——消息人士
item.description: India's government has turned down a request from state-owned iron ore miner NMDC Ltd to export its ore to China, the world's largest iron ore consumer, three sources with direct knowledge said.翻译:三位知情人士称，印度政府拒绝了国有铁矿石开采商 NMDC Ltd 向全球最大铁矿石消费国中国出口矿石的请求。
item.author: Neha Arora

item.title: 菲律宾国防部长斥中国官员“低级言论”
item.description: The Philippines' defense secretary on Wednesday accused a Chinese foreign ministry official of insulting President Ferdinand Marcos Jr during a news briefing, stooping to what he called "low and gutter-level talk."翻译:菲律宾国防部长周三指责一名中国外交部官员在新闻发布会上侮辱小费迪南德·马科斯总统，屈尊发表他所谓的“低级和下流言论”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 布林肯在哀悼加沙“令​​人心碎”的场景时表示需要美国
item.description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken told business and political leaders in Davos on Wednesday he could not think of a time in his career when there had been more global challenges, ranging from war in Gaza and Ukraine to tensions over Taiwan.翻译:美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯周三在达沃斯对商界和政界领导人表示，他想不出在他的职业生涯中遇到过更多的全球挑战，从加沙和乌克兰的战争到台湾的紧张局势。
item.author: Leela De Kretser, Alexander Smith

item.title: 零售销售数据公布后，美国国债收益率损害大型股，华尔街股市下滑
item.description: Wall Street's main indexes dropped on Wednesday, as megacaps took a hit on rising Treasury yields.翻译:由于美国国债收益率上升，大型股受到打击，华尔街主要股指周三下跌。
item.author: Johann Cherian, Ankika Biswas

item.title: 早盘竞价：中国在假日零售数据公布前寒意袭人
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：比亚迪因泄漏问题将停止为其混合动力电动汽车生产软包电池
item.description: China's BYD plans to end production of the pouch-type batteries used in its best-selling hybrids as the automaker seeks to address durability concerns and the risk that they could leak, said three people familiar with the matter.翻译:三名知情人士表示，中国比亚迪计划停止生产其最畅销的混合动力汽车中使用的袋式电池，因为该汽车制造商寻求解决耐用性问题和电池可能泄漏的风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国上汽集团将新增14艘汽车船以促进出口
item.description: SAIC Motor Corp plans to add 14 vehicle vessels in the next three years to its fleet of carriers as the state-owned Chinese automaker aims to boost sales in overseas markets, it said on Wednesday.翻译:中国国有汽车制造商上汽集团周三表示，该公司计划在未来三年内为其运输船队增加 14 艘汽车船，以提高海外市场的销量。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 疲软的数据和有限的刺激措施使投资者远离中国
item.description: China's patchy economic growth and a renewed slump in home sales have redoubled investors' resolve to steer clear of the country's markets, sending shares tumbling as foreigners quit in the absence of fresh policy support.翻译:中国经济增长的不稳定和房屋销售的再度下滑，加大了投资者避开该国市场的决心，导致股市暴跌，因为外国人在缺乏新的政策支持的情况下退出。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 2022年，尽管和谈正在进行中，印度和中国军队还是发生了两次冲突
item.description: Indian and Chinese soldiers clashed at least two times in 2022 along their Himalayan frontier where they have been involved in a bitter standoff since 2020, according to new details that have emerged from the Indian Army's gallantry award citations.翻译:印度陆军英勇奖颁奖典礼上公布的新细节显示，2022年，印度和中国士兵在喜马拉雅边境沿线至少发生了两次冲突，自2020年以来，印度和中国士兵一直陷入激烈的对峙。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 首名控方证人在香港出庭指证黎智英
item.description: The first prosecution witness to testify in a landmark national security case against Hong Kong media tycoon Jimmy Lai said on Wednesday he had been instructed by Lai to call people to join protests in 2019 and draw the attention of western democracies.翻译:第一位在针对香港媒体大亨黎智英的具有里程碑意义的国家安全案件中作证的控方证人周三表示，他受黎智英的指示，号召人们参加2019年的抗议活动，并引起西方民主国家的注意。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Edward Cho

item.title: 中国降价后，特斯拉在德国大幅下调 Model Y 价格
item.description: Tesla Inc has slashed prices of its Model Y cars in Germany, where it lost the spot as top electric vehicle (EV) seller to Volkswagen in 2023, a week after the carmaker reduced its Model 3 and Model Y prices in China.翻译:特斯拉公司大幅下调了其 Model Y 汽车在德国的价格，并于 2023 年将德国最大电动汽车 (EV) 销售商的位置让给了大众，而一周前该汽车制造商降低了其在中国的 Model 3 和 Model Y 价格。
item.author: Hyunjoo Jin, Christoph Steitz

item.title: 中国官方媒体从台湾转向瑙鲁后竞相进军瑙鲁
item.description: A reporter from Xinhua landed in Nauru on Wednesday, the first from China's official news agency to step foot on the remote Pacific Islands nation after it ditched Taiwan for China, as Chinese state media raced to build up its local presence.翻译:新华社的一名记者周三抵达瑙鲁，这是中国官方通讯社在这个偏远的太平洋岛国放弃台湾转而投向中国后首次踏足这个偏远的太平洋岛国，而中国官方媒体正在竞相扩大在当地的影响力。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 即时观点：中国四季度GDP增长5.2%，不及市场预期
item.description: China's economy expanded 5.2% in the fourth quarter from a year earlier, official data showed on Wednesday, missing analysts' expectations slightly but still making it possible for Beijing to meet its annual growth target.翻译:周三官方数据显示，中国第四季度经济同比增长5.2%，略低于分析师预期，但仍有可能让北京实现年度增长目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国2023年GDP显示经济复苏不平衡，增加了刺激的理由
item.description: China's economy grew 5.2% in 2023, slightly more than the official target, but the recovery was far shakier than many analysts and investors expected, with a deepening property crisis, mounting deflationary risks and tepid demand casting a pall over the outlook for this year.翻译:2023年中国经济增长5.2%，略高于官方目标，但复苏远比许多分析师和投资者的预期更不稳定，房地产危机加深、通货紧缩风险加大以及需求不温不火给今年的前景蒙上阴影。
item.author: Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang

item.title: 中国人口连续第二年下降 出生率创历史新低
item.description: China's population fell for a second consecutive year in 2023, as a record low birth rate and a wave of COVID-19 deaths when strict lockdowns ended accelerated a downturn that will have profound long-term effects on the economy's growth potential.翻译:2023年，中国人口连续第二年下降，原因是创纪录的低出生率和严格封锁结束后出现的一波新冠肺炎死亡潮加速了经济低迷，这将对经济增长潜力产生深远的长期影响。
item.author: Farah Master
